test-case.name: End to end testing for Vehicle Insurance Application

report.desc: Navigate to https://sampleapp.tricentis.com/101/
[Automobile Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Truck Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Motorcycle Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Camper Link] Verify that displayed equals true

[Automobile Link] Click element

[Enter Vehicle Data Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Enter Insurant Data Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Enter Product Data Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Select Price Option Link] Verify that displayed equals true
[Send Quote Link] Verify that displayed equals true
